alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Goshen County; Laramie Valley; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 30 at 8:27PM MST until January 31 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 degrees below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Wyoming and the Western Nebraska Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerously cold wind chills could lead to hypothermia and can cause frostbite on exposed skin in 30 minutes or less.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a knit hat, and mittens.
